attributes.action: General election, Allow the public to decide who should be running our country.
attributes.additional_details: In recent events It has been proven that the government do not have the Great British publics best interests at heart. This has happened on multiple occasions. Therefore, I believe that the Great British public should have the opportunity to decide who should be running our country.
attributes.background:
I would like Parliament to give the public the opportunity to vote on who they believe should be in power. 

Given the multiple flaws shown by our current leader and his party; we should be allowed a vote to protect the people of the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election due to authoritarian Coronavirus measures: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596452

Hold a general election in December 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916
